column5: Where can I buy pre-made quick strike rigs in the Brampton/Mississauga area?  I went to BPS today and they don't sell them.  Thanks.
You can try making your own. I made 4 last week using fluoro, but you can use wire as well.  http://www.in-fisherman.com/magazine/exclu...rike/index.html
of course we are still debating if they are legal or not with 2 treble hooks
I just make mine. They are very easy and quick to make.
Yeah, I just make my own too now...You can find them @ LeBaron (http://www.lebaron.ca)
I think contacting the MNR would be the only way to get a definite answer.

I just make my own..if I am using big bait for pike, I tie on a large baitholder hook, then from the eye of that hook I use another piece of mono to tie on a small treble and adjust the length of the stinger hook depending on the size bait I am using at the time
